alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 27 at 10:54AM CDT until March 31 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Chambers, Coosa and Tallapoosa. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1053 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alexander City, Valley, Lanett, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Lafayette, La Fayette, Jacksons` Gap, Lakeview, Cusseta, Ridge Grove, West Chambers, Trammel Crossroads, Sturkie, Buffalo, Chambers County Lake, Still Waters Resort, Denson, Eastern Lake Martin and Northern Lake Martin.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
